Name: PH0B0S
About the game: -WARNING: GAME AND TRAILERS CONTAIN FLASHING LIGHTS- HEY DO YOU LIKE A E S T H E T I C ? DO YOU LIKE M O V E M E N T ? TRY P H 0 B 0 S ! A 'VAPORWAVE' INSPIRED FIRST PERSON SHOOTER. BLAST THROUGH TRIPPY LEVELS, COLLECT FUN WEAPONS AND WACKY POWERUPS. DON'T GET CONSUMED BY T H E V I R U S. CHALLENGE YOUR BRAIN ON MY 3D CYBERPLANE. THIS GAME IS SHORT BUT IT IS NOT EASY. HOW FAR WILL YOU GET? Thanks for checking out my very first game, PH0B0S . Some Features: Battle hordes of strange viruses through a series of hand-crafted levels. Hidden within levels are power-ups and weapons to enhance your abilities! Explore to your heart's contentment! A variety of movement options: jump, dive, blast off of surfaces, hook yourself up walls and more! Each level has several variations, ensuring that every playthrough is fresh and provides a new challenge. Your enemy is an ever-changing threat. Some enemies can fuse with others to become larger and more dangerous! Watch out! Some Movement / Combat Techniques: Hook Climbing: Attacking upward into a wall with the Starhook will propel you up it. Beam Climbing: Firing the Attraction Beam at walls will cause you to spiral towards them, as long as you're in range. Hammer Jumping: Attacking at a downward angle with the Comet Hammer into walls or the ground will launch you away. Attack Cancelling: Firing your gun in the middle of an attack will cause it to end early, at the expense of a bullet. Weapon Combos: You can switch weapons mid attack to form a string of attacks. --- The cinematic trailer does not depict actual gameplay footage. Credits for the trailer music goes to Astrophysics.
